Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Team Cerberus, respond if you hear me.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "Cerberus, we've received new orders and are on the move. What's the status on your end?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "The status is we're wiping up your mess.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "No openings in the visuals. We're surrounded."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: '...What is your location? Kamui and I will be right there!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Tend to ya own matters, good sirs.'}
{3: 'After cutting off communications, Vera punts the Corrupted in front at the faraway enemies, and adjusts her posture using this breathing room.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "The guy put a restriction lock on my frame, saying that the battery still needs some calibratin' so it can't be used. You serious, man?"}
{3: 'The three are engaging enemies in different areas of the factory. Vera had Noctis support No. 21 while she faces off against the Corrupted in front of her alone.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "The comms aren't for you two to bicker. Give me timely updates!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Fear... Oh, I would so fear you leaving my reach, dear Roland.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "And find a giant spear right through my gullet? Didn't think I'd be discovered, though. I thought avoiding the Strike Hawks were enough.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "And that reckless and lunatic fighting style... You'd fare much better as an Ascendant than a Babylonian. How about it? Want a little squeeze of the Punishing Virus?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Well, try offering something else, but becoming an Ascendant? I'll have to decline.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Because pain is good. Whether it's my own, or someone else's.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'And pain, fair Ascendant, is something of a human thing.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera cuts a Corrupted in two while speaking, then points her blade at Roland.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'You make it sound like we aren\'t "human," Cerberus.', 4: '2'}
